newsitem.title: UK: Average discount rate at UK bill tender 5.9603 pct.
newsitem.headline: Average discount rate at UK bill tender 5.9603 pct.

text.p: The average rate of discount at the weekly tender of 91-day UK Treasury bills fell to 5.9603 percent from 6.0927 percent last week, the Bank of England said on Friday.
The 200 million stg offer attracted bids of 1.479 billion stg. The pro rata price was 98.510.
Next week 200 million stg of bills will be on offer.
